name: Dynamic Very, Very, Hard game!!
description: Dynamic is an indie Platformer game. The goal is to try to avoid obstacles and dangerous enemies who want to kill...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video card 256 mb Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Eny

reviews.review_text: This game was free, then it was removed from my library. Good work, developer!

The people who are crying because it was removed, should be ashamed of being entitled.  The dev did not host a giveaway and retract it like 'Evil Maze'.....if it was that scenario. Then, I would understand the negativity.  It was an accident, so just let it go. Devs/Publisher don't make games for free...who is going to pay the electic bill.  Removed from my account too, but don't really care. Don't think I would spend time on it anyways......and the ones whining probably wouldn't either.
